data.text:
It's early afternoon. I'm working on my laptop 
as usual and I can feel my hands starting to get tired.
data.processed:
<story>It's early afternoon. I'm working on my laptop 
<story>as usual and I can feel my hands starting to get tired.

data.text:
I read that high amounts of desk work increase 
fatigue. Thus, I decided to take a little break 
to rest my hands.
data.processed:
<story>I read that high amounts of desk work increase 
<story>fatigue. Thus, I decided to take a little break 
<story>to rest my hands.

data.text:
Heya, Tray-chan! 
I came to hang out.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Heya, Tray-chan! 
<story>I came to hang out.

data.text: But damn, am I thirsty. I'm sure you've got something in your fridge here. ...Oh, isn't that Physical X, which got popular online?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: But damn, am I thirsty. I'm sure you've got something in your fridge here. ...Oh, isn't that Physical X, which got popular online?

data.text:
Can I take one? —Thanks a bunch! 
You're so generous, Tray-chan!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Can I take one? —Thanks a bunch! 
<story>You're so generous, Tray-chan!

data.text: Heheh, I knew you'd say that.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: Heheh, I knew you'd say that.

data.text:
She still treats me casually like a good friend. 
In fact, our relationship hasn't really changed 
at all since I became her trainer.
data.processed:
<story>She still treats me casually like a good friend. 
<story>In fact, our relationship hasn't really changed 
<story>at all since I became her trainer.

data.text:
By the way, you went to the countryside last week 
on your day off, right? How'd it go? 
Did you bring back any useful info?
data.name: Transcend

choices.text: Wha— How did you know where...?!

data.processed:
<story>By the way, you went to the countryside last week 
<story>on your day off, right? How'd it go? 
<story>Did you bring back any useful info?

data.text:
Heh heh..! You thought I wouldn't figure it out? 
Of course I'd look into where you'd go on a day off.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Heh heh..! You thought I wouldn't figure it out? 
<story>Of course I'd look into where you'd go on a day off.

data.text:
You wanted to talk to some of the rural trainers out there. 
Specifically those of runners and leaders, am I wrong?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>You wanted to talk to some of the rural trainers out there. 
<story>Specifically those of runners and leaders, am I wrong?

data.text:
And? And? Did you learn anything useful? 
Things that would help me exceed all imagination, 
perhaps?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>And? And? Did you learn anything useful? 
<story>Things that would help me exceed all imagination, 
<story>perhaps?

data.text:
I went on a trip in secret, with the goal of gathering 
information that would help me bring out the best in her... 
But of course, she found out anyway.

choices.text: You've got info on me, too...
You've got info on me, too...

data.processed:
<story>I went on a trip in secret, with the goal of gathering 
<story>information that would help me bring out the best in her... 
<story>But of course, she found out anyway.

data.text:
Of course I do. 
Who do you think I am?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Of course I do. 
<story>Who do you think I am?

data.text: ――Your nihilistic and dangerous database, right?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>――Your nihilistic and dangerous database, right?

data.text:
Things you like, dislike or are indifferent to as well. 
Your hobbies, tastes, ways of thinking... 
I know it all to the tiniest detail!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Things you like, dislike or are indifferent to as well. 
<story>Your hobbies, tastes, ways of thinking... 
<story>I know it all to the tiniest detail!

data.text:
Hehe, are you scared? 
Because you should be...!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, are you scared? 
<story>Because you should be...!

data.text:
Ahaha! I even know you've been having trouble 
with something lately. So...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha! I even know you've been having trouble 
<story>with something lately. So...

data.text: Here. I got this for you!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Here. I got this for you!

data.text: Just take it, and open it!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Just take it, and open it!

data.text:
I do as she says, and out comes what looks like... 
A wooden plank.
data.processed:
<story>I do as she says, and out comes what looks like... 
<story>A wooden plank.

data.text:
That's a palm rest, y'know. You place it against 
your keyboard to rest your wrists on.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>That's a palm rest, y'know. You place it against 
<story>your keyboard to rest your wrists on.

data.text:
I noticed you were doing lots of computer work 
recently, so your hands must be tired. 
I'd know, I've been through this before.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>I noticed you were doing lots of computer work 
<story>recently, so your hands must be tired. 
<story>I'd know, I've been through this before.

data.text:
And that's when I found this absolute lifesaver! 
It really makes all the difference. Wanna try it right now?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>And that's when I found this absolute lifesaver! 
<story>It really makes all the difference. Wanna try it right now?

data.text:
How did she even find out about this minor inconvenience 
I've been having... Honestly, her kindheartedness might 
be too much for my heart to handle...!
data.processed:
<story>How did she even find out about this minor inconvenience 
<story>I've been having... Honestly, her kindheartedness might 
<story>be too much for my heart to handle...!

data.text:
Hehe... But there's a catch. 
Did I ever say you'd get this for free?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hehe... But there's a catch. 
<story>Did I ever say you'd get this for free?

data.text: You see, the Future Watch releases tomorrow. And... It's limited to 1 per person.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: You see, the Future Watch releases tomorrow. And... It's limited to 1 per person.

data.text:
But I reaaally want to get two of them..! 
One to wear, and another to keep as a spare.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>But I reaaally want to get two of them..! 
<story>One to wear, and another to keep as a spare.

data.text:
And I'd need to stand in the queue from 4 in the morning! 
If only there was someone who could go there with me... 
*Nudge* *Wink*
data.name: Transcend

choices.text: So that's what you were after!

data.processed:
<story>And I'd need to stand in the queue from 4 in the morning! 
<story>If only there was someone who could go there with me... 
<story>*Nudge* *Wink*

data.text:
Argh, what to do..? I wish there was someone (a very 
kind Trainer) who I could rely on in times like these... 
*Sniffle*
data.name: Transcend

choices.text: Ugh... I'll try to get up early.

data.processed:
<story>Argh, what to do..? I wish there was someone (a very 
<story>kind Trainer) who I could rely on in times like these... 
<story>*Sniffle*

data.text:
That's a promise! ... Heheh. 
You must love me sooo much, Tray-chan!
data.name: Transcend

choices.text: I get the feeling I'm being toyed with...
choices.processed: <size=42>I get the feeling I'm being toyed with...</size>

choices.text: I get the feeling I'm being toyed with...
choices.processed: <size=42>I get the feeling I'm being toyed with...</size>

data.processed:
<story>That's a promise! ... Heheh. 
<story>You must love me sooo much, Tray-chan!

data.text: Hmm? Really? I don't have any idea what you're talking about. Hehe..!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: Hmm? Really? I don't have any idea what you're talking about. Hehe..!

data.text: ...She says with a big smile on her face. She's always one step ahead. Perhaps she knows me a little too well.
data.processed: ...She says with a big smile on her face. She's always one step ahead. Perhaps she knows me a little too well.
